CustomField.description: Upon entry into this phase, expire the Affected Items, regardless of if it is an approval phase. This is used for Deviations: when a Deviation expires, the Affected Items expire and revert to their previously-released revision.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Upon entry into this phase, expire the Affected Items, regardless of if it is an approval phase. This is used for Deviations: when a Deviation expires, the Affected Items expire and revert to their previously-released revision.
CustomField.label: Expire Affected Items
